markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Xulgath Bomber](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2105)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 25

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Xulgath Bomber](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2105)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Xulgath" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=244" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 28</row>

**Perception** +15; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +17, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +14, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +17, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +15, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +15

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** +4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Infused Items** A xulgath bomber carries the following infused items: 2 doses of concentrated xulgath bile, 2 [moderate acid flasks](/Equipment.aspx?ID=74), and 2 [moderate alchemist's fire](/Equipment.aspx?ID=75). These items last for 24 hours, or until the next time they make their daily preparations.

**Items**
[Alchemist's Tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2), [Greatpick](/Weapons.aspx?ID=23), [Studded Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 25 

**Fort** +12 

**Ref** +17 

**Will** +15 

</row>

**HP** 115

**Resistances**
[poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) 5

**Powerful Stench** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=246)) 30 feet. A creature that enters the area must attempt a DC 24 Fortitude save. On a failure, the creature is [sickened 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), and on a critical failure, the creature is also [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) for as long as it is sickened. While within the aura, the creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to saves to recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune to all xulgaths' stenches for 1 minute.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
greatpick +16 ([fatal d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=178)),
**Damage** 1d12+5 piercing plus concentrated xulgath bile

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +16,
**Damage** 2d6+5 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 2d4+5 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
acid flask +17 ([range increment 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150)),
**Damage** 5 acid damage plus 2d6+2 persistent acid and 4 acid splash

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
alchemist's fire +17 ([range increment 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150)),
**Damage** 2d8+2 fire plus 4 persistent fire and 4 fire splash

**Concentrated Xulgath Bile**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) The [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) condition from concentrated xulgath bile doesn't improve on its own until the target recovers from the poison. A target who recovers from concentrated xulgath bile is immune to being sickened by this poison for 1 minute; **Saving Throw** Fortitude DC 22; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d10 poison damage and [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (1 round); **Stage 2** 2d10 poison damage and sickened 2 (1 round); **Stage 3** 2d10 poison damage and sickened 3 (1 round).

**Quick Bomber** <actions string="Single Action" />  The bomber Interacts to draw a bomb, then Strikes with it.

</column>
name: Xulgath Bomber

Items Alchemist's Tools, Greatpick, Studded Leather Armor --- AC 25 Fort +12 Ref +17 Will +15 HP 115 Resistances poison 5 Powerful Stench (aura, olfactory) 30 feet. While within the aura, the creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to saves to recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune to all xulgaths' stenches for 1 minute. --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action greatpick +16 (fatal d12), Damage 1d12+5 piercing plus concentrated xulgath bile Melee Single Action jaws +16, Damage 2d6+5 piercing Melee Single Action claw +16 (Agile, Finesse), Damage 2d4+5 slashing Ranged Single Action acid flask +17 (range increment 20 feet, Splash), Damage 5 acid damage plus 2d6+2 persistent acid and 4 acid splash Ranged Single Action alchemist's fire +17 (range increment 20 feet, Splash), Damage 2d8+2 fire plus 4 persistent fire and 4 fire splash Concentrated Xulgath Bile (Poison) The sickened condition from concentrated xulgath bile doesn't improve on its own until the target recovers from the poison.
